general_info.summary: This text provides a directory of various programs, schools, and initiatives at Sharda University, including the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. It also lists academic resources like examination reports, the Academic Bank of Credits, and curriculum feedback, alongside university information, student support services, and recent news and events such as white coat ceremonies, orientation programs, and conferences.

School of Dental Sciences
CREATING ACHIEVERS IN DENTAL SCIENCE
• Recruiters
School of Dental Sciences is a world-class platform where students and faculty cooperate in interdisciplinary education and research that serves its students and patient community, resulting in a well-rounded curriculum that produces dentists tremendously skilled in the art and science of dentistry.
Under the direction of exceptionally experienced faculty, students pursue a rigorous course of study at a nationally ranked college through their various degree and certificate programs. Clinics within the college accept patients of all ages.
SDS is recognised for its oral health research which emphasises on infectious diseases in dentistry, bone biology, pain and neurosciences, and other research to improve clinical and dental care.

event_info.summary: This text provides a chronological list of announcements and events at Sharda University from August 2022 to April 2023. Key events include the 6th Convocation, various examination schedules, a cyber security training program, a celebrity night, and notifications regarding tuition fees, holidays, and committee appointments.

testimonials.summary: Multiple students from Sharda University, specifically from the School of Dental Sciences, express overwhelmingly positive experiences during their undergraduate and postgraduate studies. They highlight the university's diverse culture, vibrant campus life, supportive faculty who are experts in their fields, and the opportunities provided for personal and professional growth. Many credit Sharda University with boosting their confidence, broadening their horizons, and significantly contributing to their career prospects, with some specifically mentioning successful placements.
testimonials.raw_content:
I was always told in my childhood that college days are the best days. When I joined School of Dental Sciences, Sharda University for my undergraduate programme, I realised how true the saying was. Living in a campus with such diverse culture and so many different extra curriculum activities, you learn so much about life and that helps you grow and become wise as a person. Joining Sharda University has been the best decision for my career prospects and has indeed been the best experience of my life.
Sharda University is a great home -away-from- home anyone could ever have. What a great atmosphere- what a great bunch of students- what an institute what an incredible staff! I am glad, I am part of this truly global university
BDS, 4th Year
Sharda University is a wonderful institution. There are people from different cultures here, and that interests me. I like the campus life a lot!
BDS, 3rd Year
I am a proud Shardan who had an enriching learning experience during both my undergraduate and post graduate time. The faculties here are experts in their field and were able to extract the best out of me. I have been able to reinvent myself into a more confident individual and able to broaden my horizons. I can proudly say that Sharda University has made me a better person individually as well as professionally. I am blessed to be a part of Sharda family.
MDS, 3rd Year
“From the journey of nothing to everything!
Sharda University has been a turning point to my career. The growth and opportunities that I received from the University are great, I never had a confidence to crack highest placements packages but the University had that confidence in me. The faculty, the placement team works really hard on students to build up their career. I'm grateful and will always be grateful to the University for being such an important support system.”
Special thanks to Dean, Faculty Members School of Dental Sciences and Placement Cell of Sharda University
BDS, 2021
Placed In : Pharmalex India Private Limited...
I just completed my Dentistry from Sharda University It has been a turning point to my career. Education is the most powerful tool anyone can use to achieve their goals. The growth and opportunities that I received from the University are great, I never had a confidence to crack highest placements packages but the University had that confidence in me. The faculty, the placement team works really hard on students to build up their career. I'm grateful and will always be grateful to the University for being such an important support system. Thank you for helping me to get closer to achieving my goals in life.”
Placed In : eExpedise Health care Pvt. Ltd
